Windlord:

"I woulnd't recommend that my pal"replied Windlord"Remember that 
Perceptor said that he's able to activate the virus inside 
Nightlight, but we don't know how: could be remote control or the 
conrol is inside the Pred base' computer... Altough she's in base 
she still might be in Hydras hands"
